resources.string: You have denied Mercku to use your gallery. Please authorize in Settings
You have denied Mercku to use your storage. Please authorize in Settings
Press the red button on house and drag to the actual installation location
Adjust the size of the grid until it matches the size of your room in the real world\n\nThe length of each cell of the grid represent 1m in the real world
Only 3 steps could achieve the whole-room indoor positioning, precisely tracking your items for every second.
Press the red button on house and drag to the actual installation location
Measure the size of your room using the grid
Initialization has been successful, let\'s start indoor positioning now!
After deletion, you will lose all data of previous positioning and unbind with the Stickers.
